title: leaver buster
body: i got a leaver buster  beacause i was lagging extreamly bad and i have to wait 20 minutes idk how many more i have to wait through i was wondering if u guys could atleast reduce the time for it

replies.body:
We can't do much about leaverbusters here on the boards, since those other players were still left without a 5th team member. We can still help figure out why that lag was happening to begin with, and try to smooth that out.

Typically lags spikes happen when something interferes with your network's connection to the game server you were playing on, but there's a number of other things that can cause lag as well. Checking up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a good place to start, but let me know if those steps don't seem to help!
